title: How to Spawn in Mob Spawners in Minecraft

steps.title: Type in the command.
steps.content: Type in the command. Instead of writing {name}, write your Minecraft username: /give {name} minecraft:mob_spawner . [1] X Research source This would be written as (for example): /give InfN555 minecraft:mob_spawner (where "InfN555" is just a username, so use yours instead!).

steps.title: Place down your spawner where ever you want.
steps.content: Place down your spawner where ever you want. If you are making an exp/item grinder, it would be best to have it placed in a room where there are 4 blocks of air on each side before the wall, since this is the mob spawner spawning limit. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Bring out a spawn egg of choice, for the mob you wish to spawn.
steps.content: Bring out a spawn egg of choice, for the mob you wish to spawn. To do this, no commands are needed; just go into your creative inventory (of course, if you are in survival mode, then you will need a command), and go to the search bar, and search "egg". A list of eggs will appear, just make sure not to take the normal egg (the one which a chicken drops every now and again). [3] X Research source

steps.title: Take the spawn egg in your main hand (the one on the right), and right click the spawner.
steps.content: Take the spawn egg in your main hand (the one on the right), and right click the spawner. It should turn the mob inside into the spawn egg's mob. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Now, have fun, and go get all those mob drops!
steps.content: Now, have fun, and go get all those mob drops!
